name: secury-astro
title: Secury Astro
desc: Secury Astro - an amazing theme for Blockchain & Web3 projects!
article:
Versatile Astro template for SaaS, startups, and agencies. 10+ pages, rich features, streamlined development. Create a visually striking, professional, and high-performing website for any venture, including Web3 projects.


Key Features:

  • Google PageSpeed Score 100/100 (Desktop)
  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • 10+ Unique Pages
  • Animated Particle Effects
  • Custom AOS Animations
  • Sleek Design
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Netlify & Vercel Configured
  • Contact form support
  • Disqus Comments available
  • Support OG image
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • SEO Friendly
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Free Updates and Lifetime Priority Support
  • Detail Documentation.

Pages:

  1. Company
  2. Contact
  3. Home
  4. Resources
  5. Events
  6. News
  7. Privacy Policy
  8. Terms & Conditions
  9. Elements
  10. 404 (Not Found)
  11. About Us
  12. Legal Terms
